Lome Lome removed removed removed removed removed removed removed removed removed removed removed no_ads No file manager found to open the saving directory, please install a File Manager. removed Remove ADS Work in progress, coming soon New Changes In a difficult moment like this, digital activity is on the rise and the data we store can be increasingly at risk, therefore, from today, Lome has decided to give ALL the opportunity to fully exploit the functionality of the application with a very small contribution from advertising. You can still remove advertisements by donating a coffee to the developer. Keep your data safe and don\'t miss the new features coming soon! Everything will be fine! Overview Settings About Help Welcome! Multi-Key Cloud Full Forwarding Full protection Start keeping your secret files anytime and anywhere! With Lome you can make any type of file or text safe using the most modern and strong encryption algorithms! With Lome you can use different types of keys: textual, from Key-File or a QR-Code! You can select files to be processed directly from the cloud like Dropbox or Drive! To send files directly from any app, on Lome you just have to share them! Set the block of the app to prevent unauthorized use. If available, even with fingerprint! Lome Version Developer Contacts 1.3.7 Select Files File number Lome is now AD Free! Thanks for the donation Error: The key inserted is not valid Fabrizio Amico lo2me.info@gmail.com Confirm Confirm by clicking the checkbox You have to agree before continue I Agree I am aware that all selected data will be deleted securely, permanently and can no longer be recovered Are you sure you want to continue? Start Cancel ELABORATION Operation canceled Select an option Error: Seems you don\'t have any Google account registered in this device Error: The operation couldn\'t be done Unlock Lome Enter the unlock code in the text field below and confirm Unlock Where do you want to get the key-file? Remember that you can create new ones directly from the manager. Passphrase Enter the password you want to use Password Re-Insert Passphrase Enter the passphrase Passphrase PASS INPUT Explore The selected directory does not contain any files. Error getting files: Total: Save: Decrypt Encrypt Operation type You have selected encrypted and non-encrypted files, what operation do you want to do? Encryption Decryption Error reading the Key-File: Automatic Search: Enabled. This feature is enabled when you have two or more key-files! Information By clicking on \'+\' you can import a key file that you have saved on your device. The use in the manager of these keys, once imported, is always guaranteed, even by deleting the source key-file. For more information see the section dedicated to the info you find on the menu. Deletion Do you want to delete this key-file? Key successfully deleted! An error occurred while deleting the key. Delete Import Key-File Enter the key information Name Description Save The entry of the name is mandatory. Key-File successfully added! Unable to save, you can only temporarily use the keyfile Choose The creation of a SHA-256 key is twice as strong and difficult (if not impractical) to discover a MD5 key. Therefore it is the recommended choice. For more information on the various parameters, consult the appropriate info section on the main menu. Generated Passphrase. Save to Manager Create Critical error Failed to retrieve the pin. Please reinstall the application Operation canceled Processing
operation encryption decryption in progress .. The Task has been interrupted No Task has been executed Press another time to cancel the operation Valid key: Required requirements satisfied. The text was imported! Unable to recognize the text format. Text copied to Clipboard No text has been selected! Who do you want to share the text with? Set a custom save directory, or by selecting \ \'Default \' the folder autogenerated by Lome will be used. PIN setting Length: maximum 6 digits Enter the PIN Confirm PIN The two PINs entered do not match, try again. The PIN must contain at least 4 digits Block Set Block not set File capture … File capture has been interrupted The shared file is not readable: Acquisition completed! Unexpected error: no files are selected. New Internal Memory Select Unexpected error If you view this message in a file selection context, you have probably selected too many files. Specifications: In order to use the app correctly, the required permissions are required. Lome, required permissions Please note that in order to use Lome you need to allow access to the smartphone\'s memory, otherwise the application can not be used. For any errors, make sure you have not disabled the notifications otherwise enable them from the settings or re-install the application. Add Gallery Cloud Shredder Save Folder Save Processing… Deleting Files… Completed Files Algorithm File(s) number Choose an algorithm Encryption Algorithm Choose the encryption algorithm you want to use. For more information on the choice, look at the relevant section on the Help page. Recommended choice: AES-256 File deletion Automatically deletes and safely (via wiping) the selected files at the end of the operation, keeping only those processed. Enable Log When the files to be processed are more than one, a detailed log will be displayed if errors occur during the operation. Recursive acquisition Selecting a directory to be processed will also include all the files contained in all the subfolders of this directory. Security & Advanced Lock APP Block application access with PIN and fingerprint (if available). General Notifications Choose whether to enable or disable notifications. Processing Parameters Key: Proceed Key Manager Hash algorithm: Type: Insert Re-enter Save in Manager Choose how to create the key, \n select automatic to hurry up! It is possible that the file is damaged or has not been created correctly. Database successfully exported to the save folder. The key has been saved on the manager. The key does not seem to respect the required parameters. Error while exporting the Key-File. Error during text export: Text exported to the save folder. Error creating temporary file for sharing: There was an error during the operation Enter all the parameters correctly. Are you sure you want to create the Key-File? Are you sure you want to create a RSA Key pair? The key pair has been saved in the save directory. TThe text entered is too long to be encrypted, reduce the amount of characters. Choose the type In which format do you want to share the Key-File? You want to export this key to Export Passes Removal steps Specifies the number of overrides during file deletion. Higher, more security. ATTENTION: With steps greater than one, processing times may increase dramatically. OK Are you sure? Canceling the process may damage the processed and processed files. Do you want to interrupt the same? Yes KeyFile read error: Unable to read the selected file, it does not result in a .lmk file Error loading, try again VSITR Removal Enable the VSITR Wipe Method. It is a very powerful algorithm that follows seven details fixed steps of overwriting. ATTENTION: Processing times will increase dramatically. There are no Key-Files in the manager. RSA Manager RSA Key Manager An error occurred while creating the key pair: New Enter information about the new key Error while exporting the key pair: Share the key Enter a correct password Enter the passwords correctly Critical error on reading key files, please reinstall the application. The key was successfully exported to the save folder. Choose the key What kind of RSA key do you want to export? Public Private Are you sure you want to export the key pair? Error in withdrawing the key None No key found Export database Import Database Delete all Info There is no key to export. Moving images and videos If activated, all decrypted image and video files will be automatically moved directly to the gallery, otherwise a copy will be created. N.B. Creating copies will use more memory. Apply Click on the options to change the name and description. Edit Enter the new key information Key successfully modified Error during save The entered passwords are different. Name Create zip archive: Search Keys Search results They had been found: RSA Keys: Simmetric Keys: Add to the appropriate manager? Keys added successfully Error when adding keys: No Key-Files were found. Research in progress… Key creation in progress… Managers Special Tools Delete traces of keys An extensive search will be performed on the whole device and, if keys are found, they will be deleted in a safe way (in rare cases the operation could last a long time) Remove traces of encrypted files Performs a full-memory search looking for encrypted files to safely delete them (depending on file size, this may take hours) Start Will be eliminated all the keys found in the device (not those in the application) and you will not be able to recover them, are you sure you want to proceed? Operation of deleting keys from the device in progress… All the encrypted files found on the device will be deleted and you will not be able to recover them anymore, are you sure you want to proceed? Removing encrypted files from your device… No encrypted file was found Loading… View paths Keys in memory: Files encrypted in memory: Keys: Encrypted files: Paths Fast operations There are no paths to display Prevent Screenshot Prevent you from taking screenshots in the most reserved areas of the application. This will increase the security when writing / reading sensitive information Free space: Whenever you copy a text or, in general, any file is kept track in the \'Clipboard \' in order to retrieve the content. Clean the latter periodically for greater security. Clear Clear Clipboard Cleaned clipboard What kind of RSA key do you want to share? don\'t show again The key search option consists in analyzing all the internal memory in order to automatically find all the keys (RSA and Symmetric) present. Once found, you will be asked if you want to add them to the relevant managers (RSA Manager and Key Manager). The addition of these keys is carried out avoiding redundancies, ie the keys that have the same name will be considered equal and will not be added. Used Space If the result is incomprehensible, in the DECRYPTION phase, then the inserted key is not correct. Safe Box Create a new key Tap this icon to create a new key. Import key By touching this icon you can import keys by choosing them from the device memory. Choose a type of key Tap one of the three modes and enter the key to encrypt / decrypt your files. ZIP mode By enabling this option, all the selected files will be inserted into a compressed and encrypted ZIP archive. No hidden files Select from Gallery Select from Memory By touching this icon you can take videos and images to hide from the gallery. By touching the \'File \' icon you can select any file to hide directly from the device memory. Image Category: Extension: Video File restored The file could not be restored: Error while saving the database Hide files… Error occulting files: Files successfully hidden I / O error in saving File No Application found to open this type of file. Images Video Files No All Do you want to restore this item? Size: The files that will be hidden are not protected by encryption, but are completely hidden from the radar of all applications such as Gallery, Music players, document viewers etc .. Everything you import will be viewable only from you through Lome! Filter Restore all Are you sure you want to restore everything? All files have been restored Error during restore Restore everything… Search all keys in memory An in-depth analysis of the internal memory will be performed in search of RSA and Symmetric keys. If you find you will be asked if you want to add them to the relevant managers. Keys that have the same name as those already present in the relevant managers will be considered equal and will not be added. MD5 SHA-256 File QR-Code Passphrase: Lome Files remaining Prova Restore the file: Click on the icons at the top to add someone Open source licenses Send feedback Terms and conditions Privacy rules Website Export to File Export to QR-Code Edit Export Pair Enter a correct password Symmetric Select at least one type of key to search RSA Enter the database lock password to be exported Load all the paths… Selected Files Send feedback from the about menu by email if you did not like the application, your help is essential!
